title: 有人说川普通俄门是未遂政变，你同意吗？
contents:
Dear Hillary,
  Two realities we must confront.
1. Donald J Trump is the President of the United States.
2. Deep State Democrats, MSM and Hollyweird LOST the most sick coup against our Nation.
Well 3 realities.
3. Q - Storm is coming.
America is awake, lay back and enjoy
#WWG1WGA https://t.co/2mFo8mgSwV

亲爱的希拉里，
我们必须面对的两个现实
唐纳德川普是美国总统。
最恶毒的政变阴谋失败了。
哦还有第3个现实
暴风雨即将来临，美国清醒了
＃WWG1WGA 


BREAKING NEWS: House GOP plans on making criminal referrals to AG William Barr for officials who "perpetuated this hoax" for 3+ yrs, in an attempted coup of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump.

这位推友是前纽约40区警察总管，他发推文道，国会众议院共和党计划向司法部长William Barr提供一份犯罪官员参考名单，对那些长时间参与陷害川普总统闹剧，并试图通过政变搞掉总统的官员进行调查。 评论：应该把他们都抓起来重塑美国朝纲。希望是真的！！！ 

https://t.co/K6It1JLNZ7
